title: Should a person buy the latest smartphone this year or wait for a smartphone with 5G technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you can wait till next year , it will be definitely worth it . 5g networks are on the testing period and is going to be the next big thing in the wireless network. Also the current 4g phones will not support the 5g technology. So you can wait till next your , or you can buy a 4g device and miss out on 5g.
